meanings.definition: The Christian gospel or teachings of Jesus Christ.
meanings.sent1: Many people find comfort in the evangels of Jesus.
meanings.sent2: The evangels of Jesus are shared in churches around the world.

meanings.sent5: The evangels of Jesus shine brightly in the darkness of despair.

meanings.sent2: She was known as a dedicated evangel who spread the message of Jesus.
meanings.sent3: The evangels told jokes to lighten the mood.
